text: Flavio Marazzi (born 7 February 1978 in Bern) was a Swiss Olympic Star class sailor. He has participated in four Olympics from 2000 to 2012, finishing fourth in the 2008 edition together with Enrico De Maria.Flavio Marazzi now sails on a GC32 Katamaran in the team BLACK STAR. He is the brother of Renato Marazzi. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Swiss male sailors (sport) Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Bern Category:Olympic sailors of Switzerland Category:Sailors at the 2000 Summer Olympics – Star Category:Sailors at the 2004 Summer Olympics – Star Category:Sailors at the 2008 Summer Olympics – Star Category:Sailors at the 2012 Summer Olympics – Star Category:Star class sailors Category:5.5 Metre class sailors Category:World Champions in 5.5 Metre Category:World champions in sailing for Switzerland
title: Flavio Marazzi
